short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track price drops and get refund alerts with Costco Saver - automatically highlighted on your receipts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your Costco price adjustment refunds with Costco Saver! This extension tracks price drops and highlights on your receipts. Say goodbye to manual price tracking and hello to effortless savings!
With Costco Saver, you'll:
- See Orders Eligible for Price Adjustment
- Highlights Items Eligible.
Maximize your Costco membership benefits and get the most out of your shopping experience. Download Costo Saver today and start saving!
